WRITING.TEXT: Holy shit dude what's up! you know your shit! never expected to get this detailed of an answer. If you didn't know, you're fucking awesome! Planning on following everything you said and enjoying my flowermate! thanks so much man! you're amazing!

WRITING.TITLE: Flowermate v5.0s noob!
WRITING.TEXT: Tomorrow i pick up my flowermate and i'm super excited! Im lacking a knowledge of how to use it though, as it is my first vape. I was wondering if anyone knew of any good how-to videos on it? also wondering how bad it smells? Thanks !
yo what's up my names Kieran lmao
